page.title: 10Nature Around The School.
page.content: {1.Trees,Shrubs and Flowers.} The school has a large field, which is mainly grass. Round the edge, trees, shrubs and wild plants grow. In the summer we pick blackberries, from the hedges around the school. Stinging nettles, Thistle, Buttercups and Cow parsley grow. Daffodils are popular around the field. Honesty, Pansy and Hyacinth grow in the gardens. There is a pond where there are Kingcups,Reeds and Lilies. There are lots of trees on the playing field. The Ivy grows up the Ash, Sycamore, Oak and Privet. The Goose grass grows up the fence with Garlic mustard.Daisies and Dandelions grow freely. We have got some small Elder berry bushes in between the brambles. There are nine fir trees and lots of Hawthorn in the school grounds.
